title: Apple Bundt cake
ingredients: ['3 apples, peeled, cored and cut into thin wedges', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '375g plain flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '4 eggs', '400g caster sugar', '250ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '150ml freshly squeezed orange juice']
